name: JetPackJim
description:
Made this Project to test myself. A short Endless Arcade Side  scrolling game Demo that you can try out. Use the Mouse left and right click to play. This is a working build for Pc. I will update the game with more features and content should anyone wants to see more of it.

The Android version you need to hold the screen with both fingers after the game starts to Boost and release for gravity to make you fall.

If any problems or suggestions feel free to drop a comment.

Enjoy the Demo guys
Thanks for trying my game
